column4: Hey there! I'm using ubuntu lucid. Now when I try installing kontact-related packages (kontact, korganizer, ...), apt-get complains that there are unresolved dependencies (kdepimlibs5 for example), which is not being installed. Any idea what that is about? Oh, it says E: brocken packages at the end, too.
go to system>administration>synaptic and fix broken packages
and ZykoticK9, I did that and the synaptic way, both aren't working
arent working? do they give any error?
synaptic told me it was successfull, too
try doing sudo apt-get update in terminal
well, update does not give an error, but install korganizer gives the same broken package error
as I said, ubuntu lucid, "apt-get install korganizer" says http://pastebin.com/iznuJaB6
your link doesn't load here, sorry. but the problem seems to fixed now ;)
